sentence.Network_en: He is certainly a good salesclerk.
sentence.Network_cn: 他确实是个能干的店员.

sentence.Network_en: What I dislike most is the word'No Problem'replies from salesclerk.
sentence.Network_cn: 但我最讨厌的,是售货员说 ‘ 没问题 ’.

sentence.Network_en: I don't know. We can find out by asking a salesclerk.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不知道, 我们可以请店员帮忙找找看.

list.abs: " This machine will do half of your work for you , " said salesclerk .“这台机器能替你干一半的活，”售货员说。
the salesclerk scans my purchase ?售货员会扫描我买下的东西?
the salesclerk scans the bar code .然后售货员扫描这个条形码。
i want to be a salesclerk ., 我想成为一名理发师.
The salesclerk has sold a lot of cars ., 这名店员卖掉了很多辆汽车.
